courses.title: Event-Driven Agentic Document Workflows
courses.description: Build an event-driven agentic workflow to process documents and fill forms using RAG and human-in-the-loop feedback.

courses.title: Long-Term Agentic Memory with LangGraph
courses.description: Learn to build AI agents with long-term memory with LangGraph, using LangMem for memory management.

courses.title: Serverless Agentic Workflows with Amazon Bedrock
courses.description: Efficiently handle time-varying workloads with serverless agentic workflows and responsible agents built on Amazon Bedrock.
